title: Fresh Mint, Feta, and Pistachio Pesto Recipe
full_text:
Fresh Mint, Feta, and Pistachio Pesto Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
10 mins
Active
10 mins
Total
10 mins
Serves
4 servings
Makes
1 cup
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1/4
cup
(
1.5
ounces
)
unsalted shelled pistachios
1
medium clove
garlic
1
pinch
kosher salt
1/2
cup
plus
2
tablespoons
extra-virgin olive oil, divided
3/4
ounce
mint
(about
5
sprigs
), leaves picked
1/4
cup
packed parsley leaves and tender stems
2 1/2
tablespoons
grated Parmigiano-Reggiano
1
heaping tablespoon
Bulgarian feta
Directions
Using a food processor or immersion blender, pulse pistachios, garlic, pinch of salt, and 2 tablespoons oil until nuts and garlic are finely ground. Add mint, parsley, both cheeses, and remaining oil and pulse, scraping down the side of container as needed, until very finely minced. Season with salt.
Special equipment
Immersion blender or food processor
